page.title: 08PEOPLE AND WORK (Cont.)
page.content: to kill vermin. He also has a twelve-bore shotgun. He uses it to kill grey squirrels and other vermin. The squirrels strip the trees of their bark and the trees die. Gollard Farm is a dairy farm. The owner is Mr Osmand. He has fifty-three cows which are milked twice a day. Six cows can be milked at once on the automatic milking machine. They are milked at 6.00 a.m. and again between 4.00 and 5.00 p.m.. They get a thousand litres a day, which makes one thousand, seven hundred and sixty pints. The milk is collected by a large milk wholesaler. The cows are Friesian, Jersey and Holstein. The dairy farm covers 120 acres.
